item.description:
Join Beer Advocate at The Tap in Haverhill, MA, for a gathering of friends and good brew.

TIME: 2 p.m. to 7p.m.

WHERE: Haverville, MA - about 45 minutes North of Boston

Head brewer Jon Curtis promises some special beers will be tapped, such as:

* DIPA brewed specifically for the occasion; 96 ibus and 9% abv w/ Cascade, Galena, and Chinook hops.
* 2008 Triskelion Barleywine
* Leatherlips IPA
* Helles Belles Munich Helles
* Ascension Belgian IPA
* Berliner Weiss
* Homerun American Pale Ale
* Whittier White
* Haverale Cream Ale
* As well as multiple casks

PLEASE NOTE: This is an FYI event. Meaning, it's not organized by me. But instead of keep these events to myself, I like to share them with you - so that you can decide if you want to go with friends, meet other members there or fly solo. Whatever tickles your fancy!
item.name: FYI: Beer Advocate Gathering @ The Tap
